home.title: Among Us
home.subtitle: Roleplay Role Generator
home.join.create: Or try creating a new game
home.create.join: Or try joining an existent game
game.roles.normal.message: Play normaly like any normal game
game.roles.liar.message: You can't say the truth and must act the best you can so they don't realize
game.roles.interrogator.message: Don't stop making questions, find the murderer
game.roles.accuser.message: Compulsively accuse people, everyone is a murderer
game.roles.quiet.message: You are allowed to say only 5 words per meeting, use them wisely
game.roles.paranoid.message: Everyone thinks you are the impostor, defend yourself
game.roles.buffoon.message: Win the game by making them eject you (And let the host know when you do)
